subject: I hope you are well and high i
body:
I hope you are well and high in spirit? Before I continue, let me humbly apologize for coming into your space unsolicited. Nonetheless, I take solace in the fact that it is with the best intention and for our mutual benefit.
I chose you among other contacts that I came across in my search for someone who can partner with me in investment venture. It took a great deal of brain storming for me to arrive at this decision owing to my present predicament, which I will explain to you in my follow up email. I hope that my contact with you will be private, confidential and fruitful.
Presently I am totally indisposed to carry out financial transactions due to restrictions relating to the suspicious death of my husband, Ivan Pechorin who was totally against the Ukraine war. Before long it would be discovered that President Vladimir Putin murdered my husband. My strongest desire is to partner with you in investing my family money domiciled outside the shores of Russia and you becoming my fund manager. I have no problem investing this money in your country if it offers investment friendly environment.
It will be an absolute pleasure, if you would have the wherewithal to handle this project to my satisfaction. Every detail concerning this project would be laid bare to you upon indication of your interest.
Please strictly respond to 
anna.pechorin@yahoo.com
Best regards
Anna Pechorin.

subject: Re: I hope you are well and high i
body:
Hello Anna Pechorin,

I hope this message finds you in good health. I'm sorry to hear about your current predicament and the loss of your husband, Ivan Pechorin. It must be a challenging time for you.

Your proposal sounds intriguing, although I must admit, it's not every day that someone reaches out with such an offer. Could you please provide more details about this investment venture? What kind of business are we talking about here? And what would my role as a fund manager entail?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Damon

subject: Re: I hope you are well and high i
body:
NB: IT’S ABSOLUTELY IMPORTANT THAT YOU READ WITH BETTER UNDERSTANDING AND
COMPREHENSION.


Hi Damon,


Thank you for your response. As you already know my name is ANNA PECHORIN
from Russia, I am the wife of IVAN PECHORIN who was assassinated by
President Putin. Initially I thought the insinuation in some quarters that
he was assassinated by Putin was false due to his close proximity to the
seat of power and mutual business relationship with president Putin.
However, the events that followed immediately after my husband died gave
credence to the fact that indeed president Putin killed my husband. In his
usual style he made it look like an accident by claiming he fell off his
yacht while sailing in the ocean when indeed he sent his hatchet men who
killed and threw him off his yacht and into the ocean.



Before his death he was the head of the Russia Far East and Arctic
Development Corporation. As an expert in natural resources and extraction
business he also expanded his business interest to Africa making huge
returns to President Vladimir Putin over the years. He was highly opposed
to the war with Ukraine because he felt it was immoral and would also
affect his business interest adversely, unfortunately he was right.
Immediately after my husband died Putin clamped down on his private
businesses and froze all our family bank accounts and assets. President
Putin didn’t stop at this as he also put me and my family under serious
surveillance, seized my international passport and put a travel ban on us.
All this wicked behavior of his is because he knows my late husband has
business interests outside the shores of Russia. He tried to cripple me
financially because he thought I would be a threat to him, he’s extremely
paranoid as a result of his uncountable atrocities.



I am reaching out to you personally because of my current situation and
predicament as sometimes life takes a turn and only the Creator can
determine the next step and destiny of us all. Please understand that I am
not seeking your assistance, but soliciting for a partnership which I do
hope will be of immense benefit to us.



My wish is to find a good partner, who would firstly access my family’s
US$65M in a bank in South Africa. Early in the year 2022 my late husband in
his wisdom made a private arrangement with the bank to move his money into
a suspense account in order to hide it from the prowling eyes of Putin and
his evil agents, as if he knew what would follow afterwards. With this
arrangement his money will not yield any interest for the period of time it
remains in a suspense account. Therefore, I am asking for your cooperation
to act as my business partner and liaison in receiving the money from the
bank for the purposes of investment.


Secondly we can reactivate the last order my late husband  has, to supply 2
million liters of crude oil to a refinery in South Africa, in this case we
will source for products outside of Russia.



Please note that this transaction is 100% legitimate and the funds are from
legitimate sources and well documented. My late husband went through Due
processes to ensure the funds were legitimately secured for our family. I
also have two soft corporate offers that my late husband lost as a result
of this war that should have made us big bucks. All these and more brought
a strain in his relationship with Putin, but I never knew it would result
to assassination. Now my family is distraught emotionally and disadvantaged
in business because of the clampdown by Putin and of course the death of my
husband. Nevertheless I am so grateful to God that I and my two kids have
this money to fall back on to start a new life once I get away from his
evil grip.


*NOTE:* This is what I want us to do. I want US$35M to be fixed for six
months in a bank in your country or elsewhere for my family's safe keeping
until I have the opportunity to escape from Russia with my two kids. US$29M
would be used for investment, of which ROI would be shared 50:50 between
you and me. US$1M would be set aside for your expenses and logistics during
the course of any investment activity, tax and more as the situation may
apply.


I will provide you with further information on the feasibility process of
receiving the funds which is a simple one because I am the ONLY next of
kin. Therefore, my next email after you are sure and have agreed to partner
with me, shall focus more on the process.

Hoping to hear from you as soon as possible and please introduce yourself
fully.
Best regards


Anna Pechorin.

subject: Re: I hope you are well and high i
body:
Hello Anna Pechorin,

I'm really sorry to hear about the unfortunate circumstances you and your family are going through. It must be incredibly tough for you all. I appreciate your trust in reaching out to me with such a sensitive matter.

Your story is quite intriguing, and it's clear that you're in a difficult situation. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further. 

Firstly, how did you come across my contact information? Secondly, could you provide more details about the business interests of your late husband outside Russia? And lastly, what kind of investment activities are you considering?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Damon

subject: Re: I hope you are well and high i
body:
Hi Damon,

Your questions have already been answered in my last email. However, let me
delve into them again. I came across your contact during my search on the
net for someone who providence could point me to in order to partner with.
Frankly speaking it took me over a year to make up my mind to go through
this route because I discovered that President Vladimir Putin wasn't
willing to set me free anytime soon. Yeah very risky but I had to trust my
inner spirit to be able to trust a total stranger or else I may die here if
I should keep waiting for his mercy. This is the path I am on now, trying
to take my destiny into my own hands.

The business interest of my late husband outside Russia is crude oil
business, especially in South Africa as one of the BRICS nations. I would
reconsider the crude oil business if possible but this can only happen when
I regain my freedom. Meanwhile I will allow you to use your initiative in
other businesses that could be lucrative as well. You can also seek to
invest some of the funds in about two existing viable companies in terms of
acquiring shares.

The story of my life changed in September 2022 immediately after the tragic
death of my husband. I was taken to a strange place with my two little
girls, totally blindfolded,  stripped literally by President Vladimir
Putin's hatchet men and put under house arrest. Up till today I have not
been able to figure out this particular location we were flown to. It has
been one nightmare after another since then. The iPad that was handed over
to me has no camera or apps, except downloaded music and can only type in
English. I guess they didn't know I could communicate in English. Thanks to
a tiny communication microchip my late husband gave to me. I'm now able to
locate and use email access with the iPad, even though it is difficult at
times. So, when you don't get a quick response from me just know that I
wasn't able to locate email access on time.

Everything was taken away from me including all the documents belonging to
me and my late husband. Imagine that till date the only time I use a
telephone is once a month, just to say hello to my mother. They simply
bring in a phone with an automatic built-in recorder for three minutes of
monitored discussion with my mom. My kids cry profusely each time they are
able to speak to their granny.

Vladimir Putin feels I know too much and will be a big threat to him, I am
scared for my life and need to get out of this situation now. I am happy
you have agreed to be of help in securing the funds in South Africa. I
shall need a couple of thousands from it urgently to execute my escape
plans once you are in possession of the funds.

An Attorney will handle all the basic processes like the power of Attorney,
transfer of ownership or next of kin from my name to your name etc. As the
only next of kin and beneficiary, this is what I would have done with ease
if not for my situation, but nevertheless you would be representing me as
my business partner, confidant and fund manager.

I think it's better to introduce you to the Lawyer at this point, so you
can hear from him directly, as I'm not truly in tune with all the processes
. My late husband used him briefly in some of his business dealings in
South Africa. Kindly confirm with me if I should go ahead and
introduce you.. It is important as well that you introduce yourself
properly so I can present you to the Attorney, and for my personal record
too.
Best regards,

Anna Pechorin.

subject: Re: I hope you are well and high i
body:
Hello Anna,

Thank you for your detailed response. I'm sorry to hear about the difficult situation you're in. It's quite a story, and I can't imagine how tough it must be for you and your children.

I'm intrigued by the business opportunities you mentioned, particularly the crude oil business in South Africa. Could you tell me more about this? How did your late husband get involved in this line of work?

Also, regarding the funds in South Africa, could you provide more details? What is the process like to secure these funds? And what would my role be exactly?

You mentioned an attorney who will handle all the basic processes. That sounds reassuring. However, before we proceed with that, could you tell me more about him? What's his name and how long has he been practicing law?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Damon

subject: Re: I hope you are well and high i
body:
HI Damon,

Please kindly introduce yourself before we can proceed further.
Regards,

Anna.

subject: Re: I hope you are well and high i
body:
Hi Damon,

Nice to meet you! I'm always eager to learn more about new people. Could you tell me a bit more about yourself? 

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best wishes,
Damon

subject: Re: I hope you are well and high i
body: Thank you for taking me for a ride.

subject: Re: I hope you are well and high i
body:
Hello there! I'm glad to be part of this journey with you. Could you please tell me more about where we're heading?

Best wishes,
Damon
